title: Native Bitcoin Staking on Ethereum and Solana Could Soon Be a Reality
description: Crypto startup Babylon says it's developed a way to stake Bitcoin on any proof-of-stake blockchain. Here's how it works.

title: SEC’s Gensler signals reevaluation of spot Bitcoin ETFs
description: In a recent CNBC interview, Gary Gensler, the chair of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), hinted at a potential shift in the agency’s stance on Spot Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs). This development comes as a wave of optimism sweeps through the crypto industry, with numerous financial giants like BlackRock, ARK Invest, Fidelity, Valkyrie, […]

title: US Congressman Ro Khanna introduces bill to ban stock trading among Congressional members
description: US Congressman Ro Khanna has introduced a bill that seeks to ban stock trading by Congressional members. The bill, initially proposed in September, has gained momentum as part of ongoing efforts to reform the practices of elected officials in the United States. Khanna’s five-point legislation Congressman Ro Khanna’s bill encompasses five key points, each designed […]

title: AI tokens soar in 2023: five lead with over 500% growth
description: All of the top five AI tokens by market cap are up by an average of over 500% this year.

title: Global regulator tightens stablecoin standards for top rankings
description: The Basel Committee for Banking Supervision has proposed new criteria for stablecoins, aiming to differentiate them from more volatile cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin.
